song.title: Flip the Flop (rock my Commodore)
song.info:
Lyrics: Yeah I'm on a SID chip acid trip but never trippin' Only triple platinum hits on the Ritz Making block rocking beats for my peeps Cause when we're rocking on the Commodore we're rocking for keeps And you drop your jaw in awe you never bore of the fazing, amazing, laser tasing sound of the C64 filling the floor to the max never lax The elite Flip the Flop to the beat
Yeah Flip the Flop on the dance floor as I rock my '64 Yeah Flip the Flop on it hard core as I rock my Commodore
Yeah I'm never poppin' the magic pill I'm poppin' my pelvis doing the Elvis to the SID chill 6 4 doing the magic I never sit still Speccy's get fucked, they get slugged and killed Hear the real deal Hy invitation's regulation will accept no imitation (Okay maybe emulation) But the 6581's Mace in your face, Don think you are reborn? Wait 'till you get it on Flippin' the Flop on the dance floor
